longPeriodsBetweenCaseOnset.description: Number of days used for defining long periods in the dates of onset between cases in the chain of transmission

periodOfFollowup.description: Duration for the follow-up period in days

frequencyOfFollowUp.description: Frequency of follow ups in days (once every X days/daily)

frequencyOfFollowUpPerDay.description: Number of follow ups to be generated per day

noDaysAmongContacts.description: Number of days used to calculate the proportion of new cases detected among known contacts

noDaysInChains.description: Number of days used to calculate the proportion of new cases in known transmission chains

noDaysNotSeen.description: Number of days used to filter a list of contacts not seen for a specific number of days

noLessContacts.description: Number of contacts used to determine the proportion of cases with less than X contacts

noDaysNewContacts.description: Number of days used to determine if a contact is new
